author: GamingBolt
description:
PC gamers are facing a situation that many of them are unlikely to have seen before. With soaring prices on important components like RAM, SSDs, and HDDs, getting a PC capable of running the best of today's gaming experiences is becoming a challenge. 

For those of you looking to upgrade your setup, there are solid reasons to wait if you can manage to pull it off. But why? What's caused this spike in prices and what's being done about it? Do these prices affect you if you're a console owner? 

Are there ways to manage a solid gaming PC without stretching your budget too far? Join us as we take a look at all of these questions and more, and take a look at how and why it's more expensive to get a solid DDR5 RAM kit than it is to buy a base PS5.
title: Gamers, What The Hell Is Going On With RAM Prices?

author: GamingBolt
description:
Sleep Awake gets a lot of things right, but a few important things wrong which hold it back from true greatness. It's still a great game with a unique premise and a story that's sure to tug at your heartstrings, a rarity in a horror title. 

Its presentation is its biggest draw, reeling you into a world in which the horror has come and gone, leaving you to deal with the aftermath. Does that translate to a gameplay loop that's fun enough, however? 

We dive into what makes this one tick, and help you decide if it's going to work for you if you decide to pick it up. Join us as we break down the best and the worst of this unique eye-popper from Eyes Out.
title: Sleep Awake PS5 Review - Between Sleep and Death, Is This Horror Narrative Worth Your Time?

author: GamingBolt
description:
From no details to a sudden release date announcement and imminent release, the sun has truly risen again for Elden Ring Nightreign fans, as the first paid DLC, The Forsaken Hollows, launches on December 4th. 

Retailing for $15, it adds exactly what was initially promised, additional playable characters and bosses (before that little bit was pulled from the Steam listing), but in true FromSoftware fashion, there's more. Here's everything you need to know about the DLC before its release.
title: Elden Ring Nightreign - The Forsaken Hollows DLC - EVERYTHING You Need To Know
